thread.title: Kerr Greenaway
thread.title_full: Brian Gavin Diamonds reviewed by Kerr Greenaway

author: Kerr Greenaway
title: Kerr Greenaway
text: Brian is very knowledgeable obviously, but it is his forensic attention to the details that is most impressive when describing the light performance of a diamond. Here you can be sure of what you are getting, and that's really valuable in this market.
